section.title: "Components" View
section.para: In this view, the components installed in SLEE are shown, grouped by their types. It is possible to view the components, their details and search for specific components.

section.title: View Components Details
section.para: In the Browse Components tab a list of components is shown, grouped by their type. When clicking on one of the Component Types, a list of the available components of that type is shown, identified by their Name, Vendor and Version. If one of this components is clicked, it's details are shown. The following component types and details are available:
The following details are common to all component types:

listitem.para: The SLEE component identifier, built from the component type, name, vendor and version.
The path to the jar containing this component, inside the deployable unit jar.
The deployable unit used to deploy this component.
The libraries this component refers, if any.

section.para: The following are specific to each component type:

listitem.para: The class name for this event type.
The interface name for the Profile CMP.
The profile specification to be used as the Address Profile Specification for this SBB.
The event types referenced by this SBB, either for Fire and/or Receive.
The profile specs referenced by this SBB.
The resource adaptor links required by this SBB.
The resource adaptor types referenced by this SBB, either for Fire and/or Receive.
The child SBBs this SBB has.
The event types referenced by this Resource Adaptor Type, that it can fire.
The Resource Adaptor Type implemented by this Resource Adaptor.
The Address Profile Table name to be used by this service, if any.
The Resource Info Profile Table name to be used by this service, if any.
The SBB to be used as the Root SBB for this service.
The JARs exposed by this Library component.

section.title: Search Components
section.para: In order to find specific components, use the Search tab, where it is possible to specify a string to search for and click the Search button to list the components for which the name matches the given string.

important.title: Regular Expression not supported in Component Search
important.para: When searching for components, it is not possible to use regular expressions. So using "diam*" may not return anything, while "diameter" may return something.
